TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit AsyncStateMachineAttribute extends System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StateMachineAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class AsyncStateMachineAttribute Inherits StateMachineAttribute

summary.span: 指示是否使用 Async 或 [async](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async.md) 修饰符标记方法。

span.span: Indicates whether a method is marked with either the Async or [async](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async.md) modifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应将属性`AsyncStateMachine`应用于代码中的方法。You shouldn't apply the `AsyncStateMachine` attribute to methods in your code. 对于具有 async 修饰符的方法, 编译器将在编译器发出的`AsyncStateMachine` IL 中应用特性。For methods that have the async modifier, the compiler will apply the `AsyncStateMachine` attribute in the IL that the compiler emits. 当方法 (方法*名称*) 具有 Async 或 async 修饰符时, 编译器将发出包含状态机结构的 IL。When a method (*MethodName*) has the Async or async modifier, the compiler emits IL that includes a state machine structure. 此结构包含方法中的代码。This structure contains the code in the method. 该 IL 还包含调用到状态机的存根方法 (*方法名称*)。That IL also contains a stub method (*MethodName*) that calls into the state machine. 编译器会将`AsyncStateMachine`属性添加到存根方法, 以便工具能够识别相应的状态机。The compiler adds the `AsyncStateMachine` attribute to the stub method so that tools can identify the corresponding state machine. 在未来版本的编译器中, 发出的 IL 的详细信息可能会发生变化。Details of the emitted IL might change in future releases of the compilers. 有关异步功能的信息, 请参阅[采用 async 和 Await 的异步编程](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7)。For information about the Async feature, see [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7). ## Examples 如下面的示例所示, 可以确定方法是否使用[Async](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/async.md)或[async](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async.md)修饰符进行标记。As the following example shows, you can determine whether a method is marked with [Async](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/async.md) or [async](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async.md) modifier. 在此示例中`IsAsyncMethod` , 执行以下步骤:In the example, `IsAsyncMethod` performs the following steps: - 使用获取方法名称的对象。Obtains a object for the method name by using . - 使用 GetType[运算符](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator.md)或[typeof](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/typeof.md)获取属性的对象。Obtains a object for the attribute by using [GetType Operator](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator.md) or [typeof](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/typeof.md). - 使用`MethodInfo.GetCustomAttribute`获取方法和属性类型的特性对象。Obtains an attribute object for the method and attribute type by using `MethodInfo.GetCustomAttribute`. 如果`GetCustomAttribute` `null`返回`Nothing` (Visual Basic) 或 (C#), 则该方法不包含特性。If `GetCustomAttribute` returns `Nothing` (Visual Basic) or `null` (C#), the method doesn't contain the attribute. [!code-csharp[Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncStateMachineAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/runtime.compilerservices.asyncstatemachineattribute/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncStateMachineAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/runtime.compilerservices.asyncstatemachineattribute/vb/module1.vb#1)]

param.name: stateMachineType
param.span: 用于实现状态机方法的基础状态机类型的类型对象。

span.span: The type object for the underlying state machine type that's used to implement a state machine method.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
